column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Many people told me that if your in Chicago you have to try the deep disk at Malnati's and boy were they right. This place was amazing
column2: from the meat to the cheese to the crust! The wine and bear selection was good but not great and the place was mobbed even on a Monday night but they have a full menu at the bar so that cuts the wait time down considerably.
